Paragraph & Paragraph::operator+= ( const Paragraph &  p  ) 

_title is merged with p._title and separate by a slash ('/') _content is simply merged with p._content without separation character

Parameters:
p the Paragraph to concatenate with this

Friends And Related Function Documentation

Paragraph operator+ ( const Paragraph &  p1,
const Paragraph &  p2 
) [friend]

operator +=, concatenate two instances of Paragraph to create a new one. _title is merged with p._title and separate by a slash ('/') _content is simply merged with p._content without separation character

Parameters:
p1 the first Paragraph to merge
p2 the first Paragraph to merge
Returns:
Paragraph the resulting Paragraph, i.e. the merged one
